summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Street and Sidewalk Use, amending Sections 15.04.074, 15.17.020, 15.17.050, 15.50.040, 15.50.070 and 15.50.080 of the Seattle Municipal Code; repealing Sections 15.48.050, 15.50.050, and 15.50.060; adding new Sections 15.17.080 and 15.48.900 and Chapter 15.91 to Title 15 of the Seattle Municipal Code; and adopting a new Street Use Permit Fee Schedule.
